lyric:
[by:已过期i]
[00:08.981] They say oh my god I see the way you shine
[00:12.502]
[00:13.752] Take your hand, my dear, and place them both in mine
[00:17.550]
[00:18.128] You know you stopped me dead when I was passing by
[00:22.482]
[00:23.349] And now I beg to see you dance just one more time
[00:27.602] Oh I see you, see you, see you every time
[00:33.105] And I, I, I, I like your style
[00:37.596] You, you make me, make me, make me wanna cry
[00:42.361]
[00:43.156] And now I beg to see you dance just one more time
[00:47.155] So I say
[00:48.671] Dance for me
[00:49.291] Dance for me
[00:49.919] Dance for me, oh oh oh
[00:52.005]
[00:52.769] I've never seen anybody do the things you do before
[00:57.116] They say
[00:58.514] Move for me
[00:59.065] Move for me
[00:59.724] Move for me, ay ay ay
[01:01.572]
[01:02.517] And when you're done I'll make you do it all again
[01:06.960]

[01:11.320]

[01:16.489]
